1207.question: What language technologies have been introduced in the past?

4-Table1-1.png: The language technologies that have been introduced in the past include 'Front & Keyboard', 'Speech-to-Text', 'Text-to-Speech', 'Text Production', 'Spell Checker', 'Grammar Checker', 'Local Language UI', 'Information Access', 'Text Search', 'Machine Translation', 'Voice to Text Search', and 'Voice to Speech Search'.</s>

The language technologies that have been introduced in the past, as per the table, include 'Front & Keyboard', 'Speech-to-Text', 'Text-to-Speech', 'Text Production', 'Spell Checker', 'Grammar Checker', 'Local Language UI', 'Information Access', 'Text Search', 'Machine Translation', 'Voice to Text Search', and 'Voice to Speech Search'.</s>

1207.answer:
- Font & Keyboard
- Speech-to-Text
- Text-to-Speech
- Text Prediction
- Spell Checker
- Grammar Checker
- Text Search
- Machine Translation
- Voice to Text Search
- Voice to Speech Search
